input_str:
Legendary Australia batsman Mike Hussey has backed Usman Khawaja to repay selectors' faith "in spades" should they persist with the No.3 batsman for the second Test against Bangladesh.

Khawaja made one in each innings of the series opener in Dhaka, in the process adding to the theory that the left-hander struggles on spinning Asian pitches – he has now batted nine
